summary: Student Innovation Council web application with sections for About Us, Team, Events, Gallery, Project Showcase, Achievements, Announcements, Industry Collaboration, Resources, Registration, and Contact
architectural_notes: Multi-section web application for Student Innovation Council
Content management system for events, projects, and announcements
Google Form integration for student registration
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero banner showing diverse students collaborating on innovation projects with laptops and prototype models in a modern workspace (hero-banner.dim_1920x600.png)
- Icon representing innovation and lightbulb idea in orange and teal colors (icon-innovation.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon representing team collaboration with connected people in circular formation (icon-team.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon representing calendar and events with modern geometric style (icon-events.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon representing image gallery with photo grid pattern (icon-gallery.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon representing project showcase with laptop and code symbols (icon-projects.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon representing trophy and achievements in gold tones (icon-achievements.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon representing megaphone and announcements (icon-announcements.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon representing handshake and industry partnership (icon-collaboration.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon representing books and learning resources (icon-resources.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create an About Us section displaying the council's vision ('To create a culture of innovation, research, and problem-solving among students') and mission with bullet points: Promote student research, Connect students with industry problems, Conduct innovation events, Support startup ideas

Implement a Team section that displays team members with their photo, role (Faculty coordinator, Student president, Core members, or Volunteers), and department. Support adding, editing, and removing team members

Create an Events section with two subsections: Past Events (displaying event name, date, description, photos, and outcomes) and Upcoming Events (displaying registration link, poster, and details). Support creating, editing, and deleting events in both categories

Build an Image Gallery with category filters: Workshops, Hackathons, Guest Lectures, Competitions, and Field Visits. Support uploading images to specific categories and viewing them in a gallery layout
Implement a Project Showcase section where students can submit projects with: Project Title, Description, Tech Used, Team Members, and Demo link. Display all submitted projects in a browsable format
Create an Achievements section displaying: Student awards, Competition wins, Grants received, and Research papers. Support adding, editing, and removing achievement entries
Build an Announcements section for posting: Meeting notices, Event updates, and Opportunity alerts. Display announcements in chronological order with timestamps
Create an Industry Collaboration section displaying: Partner companies, Problem statements, and Internship opportunities. Support adding and managing collaboration entries
Implement a Resources section containing: Research papers, Learning links, Tools for students, and Innovation guides. Organize resources by category with download/external links
Create a Join Us/Register section with a form collecting: Name, Branch, Year, Skills, and Interest area. Store submissions for review
Build a Contact Us section displaying: Email, Faculty contact, Office location, and Social media links

Implement a cohesive visual design with an academic innovation theme using warm, energetic colors (orange, teal, or coral accents) and clean, modern typography. Apply consistent styling across all sections with proper spacing, cards, and visual hierarchy
Render generated images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated for hero banner, section icons, and placeholders

new_feature_requests.summary: About Us section with vision and mission
Team section with faculty coordinator, president, core members, and volunteers with photos, roles, and departments
Events section with past events (name, date, description, photos, outcomes) and upcoming events (registration link, poster, details)
Image gallery with categories: Workshops, Hackathons, Guest Lectures, Competitions, Field Visits
Project showcase for student submissions (title, description, tech, team, demo link)
Achievements section for awards, competition wins, grants, research papers
Announcements section for meeting notices, event updates, and opportunity alerts
Industry collaboration section with partner companies, problem statements, and internship opportunities
Resources section with research papers, learning links, tools, and innovation guides
Registration/Join Us section with Google Form embed (name, branch, year, skills, interest area)
Contact Us section with email, faculty contact, office location, and social media links
